title: SolidJS
description: Solid is a purely reactive library. It was designed from the ground up with a reactive core. It's influenced by reactive principles developed by previous libraries.

items.title: SolidJS Docs
items.description: Solid is a modern JavaScript framework designed to build responsive and high-performing user interfaces (UI). It prioritizes a simple and predictable development experience, making it a great choice for developers of all skill levels.
